```{r clean data}
# keep usefulc colns
keep_cols <- c('BORO', 'ZIPCODE','CUISINE.DESCRIPTION','INSPECTION.DATE','VIOLATION.CODE','VIOLATION.DESCRIPTION','SCORE', 'GRADE','INSPECTION.TYPE')

# new restaurants
nrow(df[df$INSPECTION.DATE == '1/1/00',])

# remove new restaurants and restaurants with no scores
df <- filter(df,!is.na(SCORE))
nrow(df)
```
